author: afdudley
content:
Some feedback on this would be great:
https://ethresear.ch/t/a-mechanism-for-daily-autonomous-gas-price-stabilization/7762

author: sky.cactus
content: My initial reaction is that if there really is more demand at one time than another, we would *want* the price to rise/fall throughout the day to encourage users with low time preference to shift operations to off peak.
